programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 6
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 11
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: Mommy Dearest
programme.desc: It tells the story of a woman whose love for and obsession with her daughter borders on harmful and toxic behavior.

programme.title: Prinsesa Ng City Jail
programme.desc: The story will follow Princess, who grows up inside the city jail along with jail guards. While searching for her real family, she will be helped by a new inmate, Xavier.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. In the juvenile center, they must fight the odds, survive, and get out to find the real culprit, clear their names, and save their impoverished neighborhood from corruption and abuse.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Hindi Ako Ander (Itanong Mo Kay Kumander)
programme.desc: Real-life husband and wife, Janno Gibbs and Bing Loyzaga, took their talented daughter, Allyssa, through her paces in her first film appearance. Janno was jobless husband forced to keep house.

programme.title: Joe Reyes...Mahirap Patayin, Masamang Buhayin
programme.desc: Action star Roi Vinzon plays honest cop Joe Reyes. On a surveillance mission, he is able to record government Undersecretary Ruiz offering protection to foreigners regarding their illegal activities in exchange for money on video.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.

programme.title: Si Maryo O Si Goko
programme.desc: Loony William Martinez stars as your COMPU-WHACKO THRILL-SEEKER who entered into a series of hell-raising misadventures that will take the viewers to the outskirts of computer-generated fantasia.

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Dobol Trobol
programme.desc: Nino and Hero were dutiful, loyal cops. They were also inept and were the main headaches of the police force of Baguio City. It was the luck of these bumblers, though, to stumble on a major case which had its origins in China.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Biktima
programme.desc: The first time their paths crossed, they are virtual enemies – Becca (Sharon Cuneta) is the relentless prosecutor while Jing (Christopher de Leon) is the jittery accused.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Isinakdal Ko Ang Aking Ina
programme.desc: Can a mother forsake her child? She is a doctor, who almost has everything but despite her wealth, she is not happy. Unknown to her, the son she’s looking for is the very man who has been driving her around.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: M\u0026M, The Incredible Twins
programme.desc: An unfortunate accident separates twins Marcelo (Jimmy Santos) and Marcelino (Herbert Bautista) at birth. Marcelo is adopted by a poor family while Marcelino grows up with their biological parents.

programme.title: Anabelle Huggins Story, Ruben Ablaza Tragedy
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of pretty Annabelle Huggins was one of the most sensational crimes of the 60's. The movie bit player was kidnapped by jeepney driver, Ruben Ablaza, whom many believed was obssesed with her.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.
